The pork belly and salt & pepper shrimp are my favorite. Shrimp pad Thai paired with Riesling is amazing. Service is super good and super fast. There’s sometimes a line at the door but it’s worth the wait. Come to Obao - East side location...More
Excellent dining experience. Great entrees and apps. The Phad Thai and Pho is superb! Service is friendly. A must try!
Amazing Vietnamese food at very reasonable prices and tasty cocktails. Great for quick lunch or dinner.
Staff is always super responsive, food is delicious and brought out super fast (even when crowded). Price point is great for the amount of food you get.
Fun drinks and good atmosphere with the plants and lighting. Good food as well very nice staff. DEFINITELY come for your birthday. Great bday deal.
I came here for a birthday party and OMG, what a place. The service, hand and foot. The food, words can’t describe. So. WOW. OBAO.
Service was quick. Food was delicious. Great place to celebrate birthdays (ask for the birthday special).

My dad was visiting NYC for the evening and staying in the neighborhood so we decided to stop in here for dinner. We were seated immediately and the service was great. Not to mention, the food was delicious. I had the Pad Thai, which I...More

I was absolutely starving when we walked in and within a few minutes we had our appetizers and at a reasonable time after we devoured them we got our mains no wait at all! Great house cocktail we both ordered the Obao and loved it....More

column1: Awesome food, even better happy hr.
column2: My beautiful partner and I needed a place for date night and of course she picked her neighborhood favorite. Everything was amazing, we came during happy hour- the obao cocktail is a must!

It was my turn to pick a place for dinner, so of course Obao was my neighborhood favorite. We got the salt and pepper shrimp (5/5), beef Penang (5/5, pad ke iew (4/5). The drinks were also great. If you’re ever in the neighborhood, just...More
What an amazing place!!!! The food, the service, the place. If you come to New York you should not miss it! It come back for sure next time that I’m in New York!
Amazing restaurant in NYC. Tasty food, good quality, fast service and great prices. Excellent!!!. Definitely a must in your NYC trip

column1: Lovely place, service, food and chill vibes
column2: This palace is a regular for me from work. Cute little place with lovely service and some great food! The pad see iew has become my staple paired with a glass of Pinot Grigio or “sipping emotions”. Highly recommend this for a cozy 5th date...More
We went here for happy hour, had good drinks and tasty appetizers, would recommend if you’re in the area
Just ate dinner here- great for a bite and drinks after work! Share a bunch of apps with friends, and get yourself a cocktail...or two :)
Ordered pad kee mao and laksa - tasted great! Good atmosphere and reasonable prices. Service was good as well
Cozy environment, friendly staff. Great food, medium sized portions. Would recommend. Delicious food.
we had pad see u, sambal calamari, fried dumplings. Everything was so good! Also i visited during happy hours so the price was reasonable too.
The food was amazing！ nice people working in the restaurant! love it recommended pork belly ，pho and beef curry
Good service! Also, the location is great. You can walk from Central Park or 5th Avenue. I had pad see ew which was really good.
I like the atmosphere of the restaurant. The lady showing us seats is really nice and helpful. Will surely recommend!
Came here with a friend for dinner. The food is great and the service is good too. Recommend the pho!

Food is great. Drink is amazing good. Good decoration to take a friend here. Very homey. Nice bow. They seems to use high end Chinese. It's not neither too loud and a good quiet place for a quant lunch on the weekend as this location...More
Coming from someone who has lived in Thailand, this food is authentic & delicious!! Definitely a must try in NYC
Yum food! We got the calamari, pad kee mao and the Kra pow. Just enough spice but not too much. Def will be coming back!
Fun and cozy Thai restaurant my wife and I love to visit in our neighborhood. In addition to serving delicious, authentic Thai dishes, they also make great cocktails!

column1: Great spot for dinner and drinks
column2: Great service, tasty food and cocktails, convenient location and nice ambiance. What more could you ask for? Ordered the fried dumplings, pad see iew, and a “sipping emotions” cocktail.
Wonderful food! Visited with friends and we got a variety of pho and appetizers and shared. Lots of great, flavorful options!
Really unique cocktails and a cool atmosphere! Great place for a night out with friends. The kimchi fries are my favorite!
This place had delicious food at really reasonable prices. I would definitely recommend this place and come back.

column1: Very cute place, go during happy hour!
column2: Stopped by on a whim for a quick dinner and drinks. Very good happy hour menu and very nice atmosphere. Cute, intimate space. Incredible quick service
This place is sooooooooo cute and the drinks are sooooooooooo so so sooooooo good! And food rocks! So glad we stumbled upon it!
I heard good reviews of Obao and was not disappointed when I finally went. Really delicious food, nice staff, and a relaxing atmosphere.
Food was excellent. Atmosphere was fun. The drinks were very well crafted and delish. I highly recommend this place!

column1: Great place to have a party.
column2: Great place to have a party. Amazing foodie. Delicious food, great noodles and dumplings! They have a back room in the backside
We had a great dinner here, it was a lovely ambiance, our server was nice and the service was quick!
Belly full. Really delicious Thai food. I would recommend to anyone. Bring friends and come hungry. Enjoy!
Excellent service and delicious food! Awesome ambiance too! The back space is great for entertaining! The back room has a tree and has indoor heating
So delicious and such a good vibe!! Great service, great music and delicious food. Will definitely come back
We ordered pad see ew and the kalbi ribs and they were amazing! We will definitely be back to try everything on the menu

Great service! Incredible food! And you guessed it, exceptional service. Obao will forever go down as one of the best noodle and bar joints in Midtown East. Try the vegetables dumplings if looking to spice up your day ;)
The service here is amazing! Super attentive!! I will definitely be bringing my family back when they’re in town!
appetizer is awesome! I love spicy calamari. Highly recommend. The first entree is also good. Beef, onion with rice. This is a nice place!
Please get spiced calamari. One of the best appetizers I've ever had. Laksa was good and minced beef basil rice (forgot the exact name) was on point. Def would come back again 👍👍
Great service and the happy hour deal is really good. We got a 10 dollar sake for just 5. I always order Kao Soi and this place delivered, it was great.

column1: Good variety of food and everything
column2: Good variety of food and everything I tried was delicious. Don’t miss the happy hour from 5pm to 7pm for drinks and appetizers.

I came here with a few friends during lunch time, and was not disappointed. The pork belly and fried calamari are my go-to appetizers, and typically order the pad Thai or pho. Service is great, and the food is delicious.
Super delicious calamari and pork belly. And the Khao soi is the perfect balance of spicy and rich. 100% would recommend to anyone looking for an authentic south east Asian restaurant in midtown!

column1: Just had Pad Thai, Luk Sa and two desserts. Great meal!
column2: My experience here at OBAO was great. We just got tired walking from the MET and want some Thai food so we ended up here. I ordered Luk Sa and my girlfriend ordered Pad Thai. The food came fast. They were both great in taste....More

I went to Obao with my family who visit me. My fam doesnt really like American food that much, so we tried Obao. We start with fried dumpling, which are awesomee. We had pad thai, pad see ew, and cashew chili chicken. It was so...More

column1: Fushion Cuisine. Great Yellow curry dish!!
column2: I have been to Obao last month. This restaurant was busy. I ordered Yellow Curry dish “KhoiSoi” and it was really great. Also cocktail here so delicious and service is awesome. Overall. Perfect!

I love OBAO. I've been going to OBAO in Hell's Kitchen for years and my first visit here didnt disappoint either. Happy hour deals include discounted drinks and apps. Highly recommend the pork belly. Love the fig-a-tini. And the pho, bun bo hue, bun, and...More
Excellent service and food.Great ambiance.l ordered pho bo.lt came so fast.deep flavor.will come back again
Yummy pad Thai and flunkflink !! Will come again for lunch surely. Great location and ambience with vegetarians options
quick service during lunch happy hour! pad kee mao tofu was tasty - would recommend! obao cocktail was also good
Loved the food and service. Really enjoyed the appetizers and drinks along w the meal Will definitely recommend and come back in the future.
Great place to go with friends - great service, food was served quickly, and food was delicious! Would definitely recommend!
Food was delish! A great place to have an after work dinner with friends. Service was super helpful, and very attentive. Food was tasty and served quickly!
Had a great dinner with friends tonight. We shared a couple dumpling appetizers and each ordered a main dish. It was affordable and has a great atmosphere!

Great service and restaurant! Will be back again. Great spot for drinks and dinner with friends. Got the pad see ew with shrimp and it was good. Also shared dumplings. Wine is also good and well priced.
Very knowledgeable and friendly staff, great ambience. The wait time is quick and the food is spicy, sweet, sour, full of flavor. Great cocktails are a bonus!

column1: Best pad thai in this side of town
column2: Great restaurant family friendly. Best Pad Thai in this side of town! Also their happy hour is a great deal on both drinks & appetizers :)
Great food loved the restaurant and service! Service was amazing. The pad Thai was especially amazing and we love the service here. Would definitely recommend coming back again
The food is good with authentic cuisine. The ambience is great. I enjoyed the drinks and would love to visit this place again.

Stopped by on Friday night.l made a reservation so they seated me suddenly.My server was very friendly.l ordered bun bo hue.lt was hot and spicy.The broth was well flavored.l’ll be back to try something different.

column1: Best Thai food we’ve ever had :)
column2: We love this place! My boyfriend is vegetarian. Its really hard to find good vegetarian food for him but we found it! We ordered red curry with tofu, sauté eggplant with spicy garlic sauce and fresh shrimp rolls. The tofu was a little crispy and...More

column1: This is one of the best asian
column2: This is one of the best asian restaurant,shrimps pad Thai was over the top, friendly staff excellent service,bravo!

Fantastic and consistent food and service. My go to after work! Not too expensive and the ambiance is perfect.

column1: Fire food with friends and family
column2: Listen, the food was fueg. Complexly cooked, yet simple at the same time. So good I couldn't wait to write the review, I did it while eating. Chicken pad with eggs cooked to the highest degree. Thanks for the privilege of eating here.
SAVAGE restaurant. Super fast service, good food. ALSO if there was a 6th star I would give it 6 stars. Actually dank. May even have them cater my wedding... I'm not even Thai.
Awesome happy hour. Great staff! Very friendly. Kimchee fries are terrific. OBAO cocktail is killer!
Best location, excellent happy hour, great drinks beautiful staff, explained the menu perfectly so polite the staff here needs a promotion

I came into the restaurant for take out but decided to dine in. The staff is very nice and efficient, all the food came out hot and fresh. The drink fig a Tini was well made and tasty. I recommend the restaurant for lunch or...More
good food, good drinks, good service Nice place for tourists like me In the heart of new-york good location
Very convenient location in the heart of new york. Cool vibe. Tasty food. Good drinks! Would definitely recommend and come back when in NYC.

column1: Great spot with some great food and drinks
column2: We went for happy hour and had a great time highly recommended friendly service and quiet vibe service was friendly and nice
My new go to for pho in midtown East! So fresh! So flavorful! So fast! Not to mention the stellar reviews, drink specials and incomparable steamed dumplings! Happy girl! -Leah
Food and service were great! The pho bo is awesome and this location is our favorite. Always so clean and tasty with a great atmosphere!
Spring roll is relatively authentic. Friendly and accommodating service. This location so nice!! Will come back next week .
I enjoyed lunch today i had padthai noodles with shrimp. The noodles really sticky and not overcooked. I really like a texture of the noodles mixing with poached eggs. Yummy!!!
Good food, good drinks, good service! Love the decor! I had the vegetarian pad Thai and it was amazing.
Came here when visiting friends in nyc. Love this place! Drinks where fantastic. Food was tasty and served fast. Music was really peaceful and service was awesome! Would recommend / come back :)
Food was delicious and the service was great. Pad Thai was exceptional! I really like it😄😄😄 I’ll be back
Food was great and good drinks too. Highly recommended. Pad See Mao was very tasty. Bun was fresh and tasty. Winter Yuzu was exquisite. Artisanal drinks

Great cocktails and speedy service! Ambiance is nice for dates, highly recommend - staff is very pleasant and accommodating.
Beautiful bartenders and great drinks. I really like the atmosphere and service , especially all the beautiful thai women.

The food & ambience is amazing! We especially recommend the pork belly appetizer. The cocktails are fun as well!

column1: Great food. Was able to seat
column2: Great food. Was able to seat us on a Friday night. Quick and attentive service. I was most impressed with how often the servers came around to check on us
Awesome spot for quick lunch.The best pho l’ve had ever in New York.lt came so fast also the service was so friendly.will come back again.

column2: I love the vibes of this restaurant.The service is great.Food came very fast.we got the clay pot catfish and pho bo.Both of them were delicious.will come back.

column2: Food here was good. The pad Thai was good. The crispy spring rolls were awesome. The steamed dumplings were good. Got take out. Everything was quick and hot. I recommend this restaurant.

One of my favorite meals during my visit to NYC. Cool restaurant, amazing food, even better cocktails and great service…what more could you ask for. Would definitely recommend to anyone looking for something special.
My wife and me both had the Pho, which was really good. The desert (chocolate mousse forest) was awesome!!!!! Can definitely recommend.

Great Thai restaurant! Green papaya salad is awesome. Great food great service and great price! Will keep this on My New York City restaurant list.
this place is a gem. Great service, the food was amazing. It's asian fusion with bold flavor. Pricey, but all good food in NY is. Highly recommend.
Nice place, friendly staff We went with our kids, aged 7 and 10. Food was great, very tasty. Happy hour on drinks was cool We would go again
Fantastic, fresh and fast. Cozy little spot in midtown east. Had the Pad gra prao and cashew chicken-i took a chance because there are many thai restaurants in Manhattan and I got really lucky!

Place with a very nice ambience. Food was good including appetizers. They also have pho on the menu. Nice collection of cocktails. Food was flavor. Don’t ask for additional spicy level. Would visit again.

It's a cosy restaurant close to the huge office in Manhattan. The food is good, the portions are average, the price is outrageous. Hontesly, it's good nothing to say, but for me you can find a better restaraunt.

I try to make it here whenever I'm in ny for the crunch pork belly. They always have good lunch priced anf early bird dinner specials too.

Great menu choice. Loved the Bulgogi styled BBQ meat. Almost everything they have is very good. Prompt service and good atmosphere.
We had cheked out a few places we wanted to eat in New York, and the food at Obao was very good. The phad thai was as good as I had in Thailand two years ago:)

column1: Friends reunited in the amazing Obao
